comment: The determinant function is alternating regarding rows: if a matrix has two identical rows, its determinant is 0. Corollary 4.9 in [Lang] p. 515. (Contributed by SO, 10-Jul-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Jul-2018.)
